casebody.data:
BYNUM
v.
MECKLENBURG CO. SCHOOL BD. 156P09-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Bynum Waddell, for Bynum, Waddell. Mecklenburg County School Board, for Mecklenburg County School Board.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of December 2018 by Plaintiff for Notice of Appeal:

*250"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
